bike.description: 100% 4130 Cr-Mo frame, internally relieved No-oval head tube, weld on rotor plate, Tube seat-stay bridge, Tube Mono Stay BB yoke, w/ 3D forged Cr-Mo 7mm dropouts

components.description: 100% heat treated 4130 Cr-Mo, threadless, 1-1/8", 1pc CNC'd steer tube, 1-3/8" blades, 6mm drop-outs, w/ 38mm OD fork adapters
"Tank FS" threadless, 1-1/8", Cr-Mo, oversized cup, nickel plated, with SST ORYG 1-1/8 Rotor
Specialized forged alloy ,CNC'd/relieved, inverted w/ integrated hex nuts and rotor tabs, grade-8 hardened bolts and nuts, bottom-load, 55mm reach
Specialized 2-piece, 4130 Cr-Mo, 190mm rise, 640mm width, 8 degree backsweep, 2 degree up-sweep
Specialized No-flange, Kraton, 140mm
Dia-Compe 990L, u-brake, w/ "Fiesta" soft compound pads, cable anchor
Dia-Tech "Dirt Harry", 2 finger for u-brake, 16mm cable pull, 2-piece hinge clamp
Shimano SFMX-30, 1/2" x 1/8", 16T, chrome plated
KMC "KOOL" ,1/2" x 1/8", Anti-drop inner links, reinforced outer links, nickel plated, 88 links
Specialized Oversized, 3 piece, hollow tig welded tubular Cr-Mo arms, left & right drive compatible, 180mm crank arms
Solid alloy disc, 44t, 6mm thick, CNC'd center/3 drive hole and teeth
Specialized, sealed cartridge, 48 spline, heat treated hollow 22mm Cr-Mo spindle, alloy cups and machined spacers
Specialized 9/16", Cr-Mo axle, sealed cartridge bearing, alloy platform w/ removable screw in pins
Alex Supra B, 36h, alloy, triple vertical wall, CNC'd side wall, welded seam, eyelets
Specialized "Wide Load", alloy, 36h, hollow Cr-Mo axle, sealed cartridge bearing
Specialized "Flip Side", alloy, 36h, 14mm hollow Cr-Mo axle, right & left side F/W thread, sealed cartridege bearing
13g, black, w/brass nipples
Specialized "TJ", 20 x 2.125", bead to bead tread, black wall, 60 tpi, 100 psi
Specialized "TJ", 20 x 2.125", Bead to bead tread, black wall
20" x 2.125", schraeder valve
Specialized "TJ", aramid sides, PU bumpers , 9mm rails and X-brace
Specialized 4130 Cr-Mo, 30.9mm/300mm, forged alloy guts, w/ 8mm allen bolts, for 9mm rails
Specialized forged alloy, 2-bolt
Specialized alloy fork cap, 38mm O.D. alloy chain tensioners, chainguard cover, reflectors, owners manual
